snippet.title: Polandball: Not Safe For World - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The world is in danger, rioters rioting, terrorists terrorising, zombies zombieing. America the World Police just invite you to be his sidekick. Only YOU, can save the world and bring world peace, because you are the chosen one, you are the one with passion and kindness and the will of justice, and because America lacks of a partner to do good cop bad cop stuff. So, let's press the nuclear button, and neutralize all evil nations, for JUSTICE!!!

iOS:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/polandball-not-safe-for-world/id1210415105?ls=1&mt=8
Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sunny.polandballnsfworld

Also please follow:
https://www.facebook.com/Sunny-Chow-The-Guy-1409190769122959/
https://twitter.com/SunnyChowTheGuy

PS: Every events in the game are completely random. There is a chance Vaticano yelling "Allahu Akbar" when Turkey yelling "Deus Vult" with a "Make 'Merica Great Again" Cap
PPS: Polandball is about stereotype, get over it
